creators.name: CoLoMoTo (Consortium for Logical Models and Tools)

description:
This record contains an exportation of the Docker image colomoto/colomoto-docker:{image.tag} (see release notes and source record). 

The image contains a Jupyter lab and notebook environment with pre-installed software related to modeling, analysis, simulation, and inference of qualitative models of biological networks. See https://colomoto.github.io/colomoto-docker for more information.

The image can be executed directly using the colomoto-docker command line utility  [swh:1:dir:1a643c45c1e8e73a55b4da355e7a858b95824026]  (requires Python and Docker):

pip install -U colomoto-docker
colomoto-docker --doi [DOI]

See further colomoto-docker usage instructions.

Alternatively, the image can be imported using the command docker load with the attached image file:

docker load -i image.tar.gz

or with the donodo command available at https://github.com/pauleve/donodo [swh:1:dir:3c23b84c86526b41333c09093e56593028e3873b]:

pip install -U donodo donodo pull [DOI]
